name: Upsilon Labs
description:
Upsilon Labs aims to help businesses build high quality software products at value. We have a remote team of highly skilled engineers who have a lot of experience in building technology to suit the needs of your business or startup. We specialize in working on closely with the clients to provide with with high quality software solutions at value pricing. The key areas we specialize in are:
Website & Mobile App Development
Custom Technology Solutions
E-Commerce Integrations with Amazon & Shopify
Social Media Marketing
​Key Differentiator:
We understand the concerns of working with remote development teams so we assign a technology expert who will be your side of the fence making sure that your concerns & needs are met. These experts are based out of Phoenix, AZ. They will be your liason to the development team. We focus on building high quality solutions with well written code and architecture.
